entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dawson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dawson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -44.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Airport 4:15 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -44.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -48.2°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 39 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Ice fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 39 by morning. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 41.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 41. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
